channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Physical Rescue; INC#1036; 05:00PM; 2445 N Coldwater Canyon Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/49BR6jq; #BeverlyCrest; Firefighters successfully extricated two people from the overturned vehicle, and transported both to a local hospital. Unknown age/gender/condition. Nothing further.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E292 E71 E97 E99 EM14 HR3 RA37 RA71 RA78 RA97 T78 T92 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1036; 04:19PM; 2445 N Coldwater Canyon Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/49BR6jq; #BeverlyCrest; Firefighters responding to one vehicle rollover with two patients trapped.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E292 E71 E97 RA71 RA78 RA97 T78 T92; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0011; 12:28AM; 20742 W Skouras Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/4bBpPzD; #Winnetka; Firefighters responded to a one-story home with fire showing from the attic. While crews prepared to advance hose lines inside the house and cut holes in the roof, others performed salvage operations inside (gathering valuables and belongings and covering them to avoid further damage due to smoke or water). Ultimately, it took 32 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the attic fire. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E105 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA72 RA84 SO1 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0011; 12:11AM; 20742 W Skouras Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/4bBpPzD; #Winnetka; One-story single-family home with fire showing from the attic. All occupants have safely evacuated the home.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E105 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA72 RA84 SO1 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1386; 07:43PM; 11603 W Mississippi Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4bUPDXF; Sawtelle; The first 26 firefighters responded to a vehicle fire in the garage of a two-story townhome. Crews quickly deployed hose lines, and contained the fire to the unit of origin, protecting the adjacent units on either side. No reported injuries. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E19 E237 E263 E292 E37 E462 E59 EM18 RA59 RA892 SO1 T37 T63 T92; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1386; 07:17PM; 11603 W Mississippi Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4bUPDXF; #Sawtelle; A vehicle burning in a garage has spread to a two story townhome. Firefighters are in offensive mode.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC9 E19 E237 E292 E37 E59 RA59 RA892 SO1 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1129; 03:11PM; Runyon Canyon; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T22Fei; #HollywoodHillsWest; Firefighters located an approximately 50-year-old female with a lower extremity injury, unable to make it back from her remote location. LAFD Air Operations lowered a paramedic down to her, who provided care, and helped safely hoist her into the helicopter, where she was safely transported to a local hospital. Nothing further.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E261 E41 E90 H3 H4 HA3 HA4 RA41 RA878 RA894 RH114 T35 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1618; 07:45PM; 8903 S Central Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UCYcA0; #GreenMeadows; Firefighters responded to a vacant house with fire showing. It took 36 firefighters 15 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC2 E233 E264 E266 E57 E64 E65 RA65 RA864 SQ21 T33 T64 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Explosion; INC#0317; 12:15PM; 1120 N Alameda St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49FhKIl; #Wilmington; A total of *Nine* LAFD Firefighters were injured during an explosion, while responding to a vehicle fire in Wilmington. Two of the nine remain in critical condition. The clean-air CNG-powered semi truck (no trailer) contained two 100-gallon natural gas tanks, compressed to over 3,000 psi. Six minutes after firefighters arrived, one of the tanks exploded, causing severe injuries. One of the injured firefighters was air-lifted to a burn center for specialty care. Thankfully, the driver was well clear of the truck by the time of the blast, and found to be uninjured. We remind locals to stay clear of the scene, both motorists and pedestrians. There are currently no active evacuation orders, but an "exclusion zone" with a 500-foot radius has been established to isolate the scene and prevent further injury. The situation is currently static. This will be an extended operation in the area, and handled slowly, with extreme caution to ensure there is no possibility of escalating hazard.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 AP65 AR1 AR10 AR11 AR12 AR14 AR21 AR22 AR27 AR33 AR34 AR38 AR7 AR9 BC1 BC13 BC4 BC6 CE43 CM1 CM20 CM22 CM3 CM32 E112 E205 E21 E210 E215 E220 E221 E238 E248 E26 E285 E290 E36 E40 E48 E49 E5 E64 E85 E90 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 EM18 EM35 EM4 ER2 ER3 FC1 H1 H3 HA1 HA3 HE1 HL9 HR3 JT1 JT2 JT3 JT4 JT6 PH1 PL1 RA10 RA101 RA112 RA264 RA266 RA36 RA38 RA5 RA57 RA64 RA79 RA848 RA85 RA90 RH114 RS3 SO1 SQ21 SQ48 T10 T15 T20 T21 T38 T48 T5 T85 T90 TL4 TO34 UA1 UA6 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out (Fatality); INC#0574; 10:03AM; 1220 N Vine St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4bPLfJo; #Hollywood; Firefighters responded to a commercial building, where a nearby outside fire threatened the structure. Crews quickly extinguished the flames to keep it out of the nearby building. Only minor exterior damage was sustained by the commercial structure. Sadly, after the flames were knocked back, an adult female was found dead, in what appears to have been a tent next to the building. One adult male was transported to a local hospital for smoke inhalation. LAFD Arson Investigators, LAPD and Medical Examiner are responding to conduct an investigation. LAPD Inc #1837. Nothing further.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC18 BC5 E227 E235 E261 E35 E41 E76 E82 RA82 RA827 T27 T29 T35 T61; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange
